original_title: เลิฟอะรูมิไลค์ รักอะไรไม่รู้
overview: The husband, a policeman and the wife, a fashion designer who always fighting with each other because of their career. One day, something magically happen that force them to understand each other's life.
tagline: As he became her and she became him.
title: Love Arumirai
